snippet: International talks in Australia on establishing two marine reserve areas, each larger than Texas, in the waters around Antarctica ended in failure on Friday.
abstract: International talks in Australia on establishing two large marine reserve areas in the waters around Antarctica end in failure, with some delegates to negotiations saying China and Russia had resisted proposals.
lead_paragraph: International talks in Australia on establishing two marine reserve areas, each larger than Texas, in the waters around Antarctica ended in failure on Friday.

headline.main: China and Russia Said to Block Creation of Antarctic Marine Reserves
headline.print_headline: Delegates Fail to Agree on Creation of Marine Reserves

keywords.value: Commission for the Conservation of Antarctic Marine Living Resources
keywords.name: organizations
